questions.title: Run lightning-charge on c-lightning regtest
questions.body: I'm trying to run lighting-charge (https://github.com/ElementsProject/lightning-charge) on top of one of my 2 lightning (https://github.com/ElementsProject/lightning) instances. I am running 2 nodes using the script here: lightning/contrib/startup_regtest.sh. This file will start a bitcoin instance as well as 2 lightning nodes (/tmp/l1-regtest, /tmp/l2-regtest)

questions.title: lightning to lightning non custodial swaps
questions.body: Do you know the way to freeze funds in lightning tx to implement atomic swap between two independent lightning networks?
